Enumeration Type Documentation

enum PACC::Threading::Error

Supported Multithread error codes.

Enumerator:
eMutexNotOwned 

Mutex not own by calling thread.

eWouldDeadLock 

Operation would produce a dead lock.

eRunning 

Thread is already running.

eOtherError 

Any other OS specific error.
